entry.title: Saturday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few rain showers ending this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 early this evening then north 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High plus 5.

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
